section.title: About this guide
section.p: This guide describes how to install Yeastar K2 IPPBX system in your own physical machine or virtual machine. In this guide, we also provide procedures of K2 system activation and expansion.

section.title: Audience
section.p: This guide is for the person who only buys Yeastar K2 IPPBX software, and wants to install the K2 IPPBX system in his/her own machine.
